titles.title: Defend Israel by Defunding Palestinian Foreign Aid Act of 2015
To prohibit assistance to the Palestinian Authority until it withdraws its request to join the International Criminal Court.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
1/12/2015--Introduced. Defend Israel by Defunding Palestinian Foreign Aid Act of 2015
This bill prohibits any amounts from being obligated or expended to provide assistance, loan guarantees, or debt relief to the Palestinian Authority (PA), or any affiliated governing entity, until the PA withdraws its request to join the International Criminal Court.
